GetVmVolumeSnapshotsRequestBody.after: Fill in a single resource’s id, representing to acquire resources after this resource and not including it.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsRequestBody.before: Fill in a single resource’s id, representing to acquire resources before this resource but not including it.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsRequestBody.first: It can be used together with after / before, representing the number of data acquired after the specified resource.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsRequestBody.last: It can be used together with after / before, representing the number of data acquired before the specified resource.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsRequestBody.orderBy: It represents the order of query results, usually including descending or ascending order of all the fields of the resource, i.e., _DESC or _ASC.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsRequestBody.skip: It can be used together with after / before, representing to start a query after skipping n items of the specified resource.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsRequestBody.where: conditional query, representing to query the resources that meet the conditions.

GetVmVolumeSnapshotsConnectionRequestBod.after: Fill in a single resource’s id, representing to acquire resources after this resource and not including it.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsConnectionRequestBod.before: Fill in a single resource’s id, representing to acquire resources before this resource but not including it.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsConnectionRequestBod.first: It can be used together with after / before, representing the number of data acquired after the specified resource.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsConnectionRequestBod.last: It can be used together with after / before, representing the number of data acquired before the specified resource.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsConnectionRequestBod.orderBy: It represents the order of query results, usually including descending or ascending order of all the fields of the resource, i.e., _DESC or _ASC.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsConnectionRequestBod.skip: It can be used together with after / before, representing to start a query after skipping n items of the specified resource.
GetVmVolumeSnapshotsConnectionRequestBod.where: conditional query, representing to query the resources that meet the conditions.
